com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.agent.Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentExampleAbc, AgentExampleD

    public class Agent
extends Object
    Provides methods that can be used by Java-agent classes in order to fit an existing execution environment com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.env*.

    Instantiability: forbidden.
    Thread safety: thread-safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static Logger LOGGER
      Instance of Logger that should be used for logging.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Agent()
      Constructor was made protected and not private because the class is supposed to be extended.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static void initInstrumentationEnvironment(Instrumentation inst)
      Initializes instrumentation environment.
      protected static void processArgs(String args)
      Process command-line arguments and configures logging system.
      protected static void registerClassFileTransformers(ClassFileTransformer[] transformers)
      Registers supplied class file transformers in the order they are presented in the supplied array.

    • Field Detail

      • LOGGER

        protected static final Logger LOGGER
        Instance of Logger that should be used for logging. Logging system must be configured via invocation of processArgs(String) method before using this instance.
        See Also:
        processArgs(String)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        protected Agent()
         throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Constructor was made protected and not private because the class is supposed to be extended.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - The class is not designed to be instantiated so the constructor always throws an exception.

    • Method Detail

      • initInstrumentationEnvironment

        protected static final void initInstrumentationEnvironment(Instrumentation inst)
        Initializes instrumentation environment. Being invoked with not null parameter, does nothing in subsequent invocations.
        Parameters:
        inst - Instance of Instrumentation provided by JVM. Must be not null.

      • processArgs

        protected static final void processArgs(String args)
        Process command-line arguments and configures logging system.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments for Java-agent.

      • registerClassFileTransformers

        protected static final void registerClassFileTransformers(ClassFileTransformer[] transformers)
        Registers supplied class file transformers in the order they are presented in the supplied array. Instrumentation environment must be initialized (see initInstrumentationEnvironment(Instrumentation) before using this method.
        Parameters:
        transformers - Array of ClassFileTransformer instances to register in the Instrumentation.
        See Also:
        initInstrumentationEnvironment(Instrumentation)
